title: D'argent et de sang
overview: The scam of the century, which occurred in France and Europe between 2008 and 2009. Billions went up in smoke on the new financial market of "carbon quotas" invented to fight against global warming. The association of crooks from Belleville with a trader from the upscale neighborhoods, tracked by an obsessive investigator. When human passions are unleashed beyond simple interest.Â
